title: The Shawshank Redemption.mkv
description:
_____________________________Public Service Announcement_____________________________

OK. So I have uploaded a couple movies and they are being downloaded, which is good! I am trying something different.  I am uploading movies raw.  They are MKV format, but there is no loss in quality of video or audio, hence the size of the rips from blu-ray and dvd. In order to play MKV files you need the MKV codec or VLC.  If your using XBMC you are all set!  I've also decided that I would rather leave the choice up to the individual as to how they want the file. If your a purest and have the room like I do, than you can play them as is.  But you also have the option of compressing these any way you see fit for whatever device you want to use.  I am very curious about feedback, so please feel free to comment!

_________________________________Movie_Details_______________________________________

The Shawshank Redemption  (1994)
                              
Language:        English
Subtitles:       None
Run time:        2 hours 22 minutes

Format:          Matroska (MKV)  If not using XBMC you will need codec or VLC
File Size:       5.84 GB
Resolution:      SD (720 x 480) 16:9

Audio Format:    Dolby Digital
Channels:        5.1 48Khz 16bit
